serde

Implements serialization and deserialization logic for persisting story data, bindings, and event listeners when users refresh foundry.

Classes

HookData
SessionData

Methods

(static) loadExternalBindingFromFlag(flaggable) → {BindingData}

See:
  • saveExternalBindingToFlag creates the flags accessed by this function

Retrieves external binding data, allowing ink's FFI external bindings to be reregistered when a story needs to resume.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
flaggable FlaggableObject

the object that implements foundry's setFlag interface.
Returns:

bindingData - the external binding stored in a flag.

Type
BindingData

(static) saveExternalBindingToFlag(flaggable, bindingData)

Serializes external binding data into a flag for a foundry object. This is necessary because external bindings created by macros or through console commands do not persist when foundry is rebooted or refreshed.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
flaggable FlaggableObject

the object that implements foundry's setFlag interface.
bindingData BindingData

the external binding to be stored in a flag.
